ResourceHeader.AlternateName: Very Low Frequency Atmospheric Weather Electromagnetic System for Observation, Modeling, and Education
ResourceHeader.Description: The VLF AWESOME, completed in 2004 provides high sensitivity broadband radio measurements of natural lightning emissions, transmitting beacons, and radio emissions from the near-Earth space environment over the the frequency band 0.8-50 kHz.

InformationURL.Name: Sensitive Broadband ELF/VLF Radio Reception With the AWESOME Instrument
